$description: Progress component tokens. Progress bars indicate the completion status of a task or process. These tokens compose primitive tokens into progress-specific configurations. Use progress for: file uploads, form completion, loading states, step indicators. ACCESSIBILITY: Always provide aria-valuenow, aria-valuemin, aria-valuemax. Include text alternative for screen readers.

height.$description: Track heights for different visual densities.

xs.$description: Extra small track height (3px). Use for: subtle progress indicators, inline progress.

sm.$description: Small track height (5px). Use for: compact progress bars, secondary indicators.

md.$description: Medium track height (8px). DEFAULT. Use for: standard progress bars.

lg.$description: Large track height (12px). Use for: prominent progress bars, progress with labels.

xl.$description: Extra large track height (16px). Use for: hero progress bars, progress with embedded text labels.

borderRadius.$description: Track border radius (full). Pill-shaped track is the standard progress bar shape.
Fill border radius (full). Matches track borderRadius for consistent pill shape.

transition.$description: Fill animation when progress value changes.

duration.$description: Fill transition duration (300ms). Smooth animation when progress updates. Slow enough to be visible but not sluggish.

easing.$description: Fill transition easing. Ease-in-out creates natural-feeling progress advancement.

label.$description: Progress label configuration for embedded percentage text.

fontSize.$description: Label font size (12px). Small text fits inside larger track sizes (lg, xl).

fontWeight.$description: Label font weight. Semibold ensures readability on colored fill background.
